list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat(User): refactor generate method to use sources from external file
- Updated the `generate` method in `MakerUserBundle.php` to load sources from an external file instead of hardcoding them. - Improved the handling of generated classes and configuration files. - Adjusted the instantiation of `YamlSourceManipulator` to use the file contents directly.

task.summary: Default task
ide(config): added/updated automatically
feat(user): add user management entities and controllers templates
feat: add .gitkeep files in factories and fixtures directories
ide(config): added/updated automatically
feat(traits): add MakeHelpFileTrait for help file retrieval functionality

feat(routes): add idm_user routes configuration template file
- Introduced a new YAML configuration file for user routes in the IdmUserBundle. - This file imports various route resources for login, profile, registration, and password reset functionalities.
delete: removed empty test directory
feat(rate-limiter): add configuration for user login rate limiting

refactor(user): update namespaces in user-related templates
- Updated namespaces in the following files to use dynamic `<?= $namespace; ?>` instead of hardcoded `App\Entity\User`: - UserCrudController.tpl.php - Connections.tpl.php - ConnectionsLog.tpl.php - ResetPasswordRequest.tpl.php - ResetPasswordRequestLog.tpl.php - Log.tpl.php - User.tpl.php - Premium.tpl.php - PremiumLog.tpl.php - UserRepository.tpl.php - ResetPasswordRequestRepository.tpl.php
ide(config): added/updated automatically.

feat(security): add SecurityTrait for user authentication configuration
- Introduced a new trait `SecurityTrait` to manage security configuration for user authentication within the Maker Bundle. This trait includes methods to update the security settings for providers, firewalls, and password hashers, enhancing the flexibility of user management.
ide(config): added/updated automatically
feat(user-bundle): add MakerUserBundleFiles for user bundle generation
update(funding): remove unused sponsorship platforms and clean up file
updated(dependencies): for .github/labeler.yml

fix(workflow): update pull request labeler configuration
- Changed the workflow name to "Pull Request Labeler". - Updated the trigger to use `pull_request_target`. - Renamed job from `label` to `labeler`. - Added permissions for contents and pull requests. - Updated action version to `v5`.
feat(templates): add bug report and feature request issue templates
feat(config): add initial configuration files for Symfony
feat(config): add initial configuration files for Symfony
feat(config): add initial configuration files for Symfony
feat(kernel): add initial Kernel class for application structure
fix: remove unused TemplateController from Kernel.php
docs: add SECURITY.md file with security policy and reporting guidelines
ide(config): added/updated automatically

chore(workflow): update labeler action and add checkout step
- Added `actions/checkout@v4` to the workflow for sparse-checkout. - Updated the workflow to include the necessary steps for labeler action.
feat(workflow): add GitHub Actions workflow for building documentation

chore: update GitHub Actions workflow for IDMarinas Template Bundle
- Renamed the workflow to "IDMarinas Template Bundle Test Suite". - Updated the `on` section to include more event types and ignore specific tags. - Modified the `push` section to ignore certain paths. - Adjusted the PHP and Symfony matrix versions for the build job. - Updated `actions/checkout` to version 4 and added fetch-depth condition. - Changed `ramsey/composer-install` action to version 3. - Added a SonarCloud Scan step for PHP 8.2 and Symfony 6.4.*.

chore: update GitHub Actions workflow for IDMarinas Template Bundle
- Renamed the workflow to "IDMarinas Template Bundle Test Suite". - Updated the `on` section to include more event types and ignore specific tags. - Modified the `push` section to ignore certain paths. - Adjusted the PHP and Symfony matrix versions for the build job. - Updated `actions/checkout` to version 4 and added fetch-depth condition. - Changed `ramsey/composer-install` action to version 3. - Added a SonarCloud Scan step for PHP 8.2 and Symfony 6.4.*.

feat: add description to composer.json and reorganize config section
- Added a description for the package in composer.json. - Reorganized the config section for better clarity and structure.

feat(README): update badge links and add new badges
- Updated badge links to point to the correct branch (2.x) for test suite, quality gate status, coverage, and technical debt. - Added new badges for GitHub release information and commit activity. - Removed outdated badge links for GitHub release and last commit.
fix(workflow): update name for IDMarinas Maker Bundle Test Suite
feat(docs): add configuration, security, requirements, and installation documentation
fix: correct spelling in the command description for User Bundle files
feat(dependencies): add idmarinas/common-bundle as a dev dependency
ide(config): added/updated automatically

feat(User): refactor generate method to use GenerateClassTrait
- Added `GenerateClassTrait` to `MakerUserBundleFiles` for improved class generation. - Refactored the `generate` method to streamline class creation by utilizing the new trait. - Removed redundant code for class generation and replaced it with a call to `generateClasses` method.

refactor(user): simplify template file retrieval in MakerUserBundleFiles
- Updated the method for generating class templates to remove unnecessary parameters. - Simplified the retrieval of template file paths by introducing a new method `getTpl`. - Removed the old `tplBundle` method to streamline the code.
flex(recipe): updated symfony.lock file
ide(config): added/updated automatically
style(controller): format code in UserCrudController template for consistency
ide(config): added/updated automatically
feat(dev): add easyadmin-bundle as a development dependency

feat(tests): add bootstrap file for test environment setup
- Introduced a new `bootstrap.php` file to initialize the test environment for the Maker Bundle. - The file sets up the Symfony Kernel and ensures that the cache and log directories are cleared before running tests.
fix: update version annotations to 2.0.0 across configuration files
feat(tpl): added templates for contact system
feat(command): added maker command for generate contact files

feat: add GenerateClassTrait for class generation functionality
- Introduced the GenerateClassTrait which provides methods to generate classes based on provided templates and source data. - Implemented functionality for handling use statements and class variable merging. - Added methods to retrieve the appropriate namespace and template for class generation.

fix(docs): update installation instructions for development mode
- Changed `composer require %package_name%` to `composer require --dev %package_name%` in the installation steps for applications that use Symfony Flex and those that don't. - Updated the bundle registration to enable it only for 'dev' and 'test' environments.
fix: change MakerCommonContact class to final for better design

refactor: rename namespace in SecurityTrait.php for consistency
- Updated the namespace from `Idm\Bundle\Maker\Maker\User\MakerUserBundleFiles` to `Idm\Bundle\Maker\Maker\User\MakerUserBundle`. - Changed the visibility comment for the `updateSecurityConfig` method from `@private` to `@internal`.

refactor(user-bundle): rename MakerUserBundleFiles to MakerUserBundle
- Renamed `MakerUserBundleFiles.php` to `MakerUserBundle.php`. - Updated namespace and class name references accordingly. - Modified the command name from `make:idm:user-bundle` to `make:idm:user:bundle`.

feat(User): refactor generate method to use sources from external file
- Updated the `generate` method in `MakerUserBundle.php` to load sources from an external file instead of hardcoding them. - Improved the handling of generated classes and configuration files. - Adjusted the instantiation of `YamlSourceManipulator` to use the file contents directly.

MESSAGE.value: docs: add SECURITY.md file with security policy and reporting guidelines

chore(workflow): update labeler action and add checkout step
- Added `actions/checkout@v4` to the workflow for sparse-checkout. - Updated the workflow to include the necessary steps for labeler action.
feat(workflow): add GitHub Actions workflow for building documentation

chore: update GitHub Actions workflow for IDMarinas Template Bundle
- Renamed the workflow to "IDMarinas Template Bundle Test Suite". - Updated the `on` section to include more event types and ignore specific tags. - Modified the `push` section to ignore certain paths. - Adjusted the PHP and Symfony matrix versions for the build job. - Updated `actions/checkout` to version 4 and added fetch-depth condition. - Changed `ramsey/composer-install` action to version 3. - Added a SonarCloud Scan step for PHP 8.2 and Symfony 6.4.*.

feat: add description to composer.json and reorganize config section
- Added a description for the package in composer.json. - Reorganized the config section for better clarity and structure.

feat(README): update badge links and add new badges
- Updated badge links to point to the correct branch (2.x) for test suite, quality gate status, coverage, and technical debt. - Added new badges for GitHub release information and commit activity. - Removed outdated badge links for GitHub release and last commit.
fix(workflow): update name for IDMarinas Maker Bundle Test Suite
feat(docs): add configuration, security, requirements, and installation documentation
fix: correct spelling in the command description for User Bundle files
feat(dependencies): add idmarinas/common-bundle as a dev dependency

- Added `GenerateClassTrait` to `MakerUserBundleFiles` for improved class generation. - Refactored the `generate` method to streamline class creation by utilizing the new trait. - Removed redundant code for class generation and replaced it with a call to `generateClasses` method.

refactor(user): simplify template file retrieval in MakerUserBundleFiles
- Updated the method for generating class templates to remove unnecessary parameters. - Simplified the retrieval of template file paths by introducing a new method `getTpl`. - Removed the old `tplBundle` method to streamline the code.

- Introduced a new `bootstrap.php` file to initialize the test environment for the Maker Bundle. - The file sets up the Symfony Kernel and ensures that the cache and log directories are cleared before running tests.

feat(command): added maker command for generate contact files

feat: add GenerateClassTrait for class generation functionality
- Introduced the GenerateClassTrait which provides methods to generate classes based on provided templates and source data. - Implemented functionality for handling use statements and class variable merging. - Added methods to retrieve the appropriate namespace and template for class generation.

fix(docs): update installation instructions for development mode
- Changed `composer require %package_name%` to `composer require --dev %package_name%` in the installation steps for applications that use Symfony Flex and those that don't. - Updated the bundle registration to enable it only for 'dev' and 'test' environments.

refactor: rename namespace in SecurityTrait.php for consistency
- Updated the namespace from `Idm\Bundle\Maker\Maker\User\MakerUserBundleFiles` to `Idm\Bundle\Maker\Maker\User\MakerUserBundle`. - Changed the visibility comment for the `updateSecurityConfig` method from `@private` to `@internal`.

refactor(user-bundle): rename MakerUserBundleFiles to MakerUserBundle
- Renamed `MakerUserBundleFiles.php` to `MakerUserBundle.php`. - Updated namespace and class name references accordingly. - Modified the command name from `make:idm:user-bundle` to `make:idm:user:bundle`.

- Updated the `generate` method in `MakerUserBundle.php` to load sources from an external file instead of hardcoding them. - Improved the handling of generated classes and configuration files. - Adjusted the instantiation of `YamlSourceManipulator` to use the file contents directly.

option.value:
feat(User): refactor generate method to use sources from external file
- Updated the `generate` method in `MakerUserBundle.php` to load sources from an external file instead of hardcoding them. - Improved the handling of generated classes and configuration files. - Adjusted the instantiation of `YamlSourceManipulator` to use the file contents directly.
